lead_paragraph: I am a Pollyanna. I believe I will live to see a Triple Crown. I state that every January 1 as I proclaim loudly to the heavens -- "This IS the year of our Triple Crown winner." So when I went to my first horse race, which was the Big Brown Belmont Stakes, I sat for an hour or more in the stands not wallowing in disappointment but pondering the Triple Crown trail. I wrote a story that night that said that in the future I would go to the Kentucky Derby to watch the beginning of a dream.
snippet: The Kentucky Derby marks the beginning of a Triple Crown dream.

headline.main: Ahead of Derby, a Triple Crown Dream
